body_html:
for train op:
EstimatorSpec(train_op = tf.group(yaw_train_op, pitch_train_op, roll_train_op), ...)

for loss:
to see each of them separately on Tensorboard use:

tf.summary.scalar('yaw_total_loss', yaw_total_loss)
tf.summary.scalar('pitch_total_loss', pitch_total_loss)
tf.summary.scalar('roll_total_loss', roll_total_loss)

EstimatorSpec(loss=yaw_total_loss + pitch_total_loss + roll_total_loss, ...)
body_text:
for train op:
EstimatorSpec(train_op = tf.group(yaw_train_op, pitch_train_op, roll_train_op), ...)
for loss:
to see each of them separately on Tensorboard use:
tf.summary.scalar('yaw_total_loss', yaw_total_loss)
tf.summary.scalar('pitch_total_loss', pitch_total_loss)
tf.summary.scalar('roll_total_loss', roll_total_loss)

EstimatorSpec(loss=yaw_total_loss + pitch_total_loss + roll_total_loss, ...)
body:
for train op:
`EstimatorSpec(train_op = tf.group(yaw_train_op, pitch_train_op, roll_train_op), ...)`

for loss:
to see each of them separately on Tensorboard use: 
```
tf.summary.scalar('yaw_total_loss', yaw_total_loss)
tf.summary.scalar('pitch_total_loss', pitch_total_loss)
tf.summary.scalar('roll_total_loss', roll_total_loss)

EstimatorSpec(loss=yaw_total_loss + pitch_total_loss + roll_total_loss, ...)
```
